title: Still have not received my gift, pls help me riot
body: I did get the icon today but I have not received my gift get, help me riot want my free stuff.

replies.body: Free stuff is great, but there are a lot of eligible accounts so it's going to take a bit of time to send it out to everyone.  Stay up to date through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we distribute the gifts.  Hang tight and you'll get the goods!
